00004 #ifndef _XVIMAGESCALAR_ICC_
00005 #define _XVIMAGESCALAR_ICC_
00006 
00007 template <class SC1, class SC2>
00008 XVImageScalar<SC2> & ScalartoScalar(const XVImageScalar<SC1> & src,
00009                         XVImageScalar<SC2> & targ){
00010 
00011   XVImageIterator<SC1> srcIter(src);
00012   
00013   targ.resize(src.Width(), src.Height());
00014   XVImageWIterator<SC2> targIter(targ);
00015 
00016   for(; !srcIter.end(); ++srcIter, ++targIter){
00017     *targIter = (SC2) (*srcIter);
00018   };
00019   return targ ;
00020 };
00021 
00022 #define IMAGE_OP_BOOL(OP) \
00023 template <class T> \
00024 XVImageScalar<T> operator OP (const XVImageScalar<T> & im1, \
00025                    const XVImageScalar<T> & im2){ \
00026 \
00027   ASSERT(im1.Width() == im2.Width() && im1.Height() == im2.Height()); \
00028   XVImageIterator<T> iter1(im1); \
00029   XVImageIterator<T> iter2(im2); \
00030   XVImageScalar<T> targ(im1.Width(), im1.Height()); \
00031   XVImageWIterator<T> trgIter(targ); \
00032   for(; !iter1.end(); ++iter1, ++iter2, ++trgIter){ \
00033     *trgIter = *iter1 OP *iter2; \
00034   } \
00035   return targ; \
00036 };
00037 
00038 IMAGE_OP_BOOL(+);
00039 IMAGE_OP_BOOL(-);
00040 IMAGE_OP_BOOL(*);
00041 IMAGE_OP_BOOL(/);
00042 
00043 #define IMAGE_OP_INT(OP) \
00044 template <class T> \
00045 XVImageScalar<T> operator OP (const XVImageScalar<T> & im1, T val){ \
00046 \
00047   XVImageScalar<T> targ(im1.Width(), im1.Height()); \
00048   XVImageIterator<T> iter(im1); \
00049   XVImageWIterator<T> targIter(targ); \
00050   for(; !iter.end(); ++iter, ++targIter){ \
00051     *targIter = *iter OP val; \
00052   }; \
00053   return targ; \
00054 };
